page.title: 07Cupar Education
page.content: The{Secondary school}is called Bell Baxter.It is a 6 year comprehensive & at present is split into 2 buildings. The Westport building houses 996 pupils-1st,2nd & a portion of 3rd year.The Westfield building houses 868 pupils from 3rd to 6th year. Bell Baxter supplies a comprehensive academic{education}taught by 140 teachers.After 2nd year the number of subjects studied are narrowed down in preparation for{"O" Grade exams}which are taken in 4th year.After this pupils may decide to leave or to stay for a 5th & 6th year to sit{"O","H",or {C.S.Y.S. exams.} The introduction of the new{Munn & {Dunning examination system}of certificates for all has been postponed indefinately due to {industrial action}by Scottish teachers claiming an independent pay review.
